title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 91.15 - Traffic safety law enforcement and disposition (tsleandd) system
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 91.15 - Traffic safety law enforcement and disposition (tsleandd) system

State Regulations

Sections 91.1 through
91.14
of this Part shall not apply
in the TSLE&D area to tickets issued on and after the effective date of
entry of any particular county or geographical location into the TSLE&D
System. The effective date of entry into the TSLE&D System shall be as
follows: (a) July 1, 1984--The

Counties of Cayuga, Chemung, Livingston, Monroe (except the City of Rochester), Ontario, Schuyler, Seneca, Steuben, Wayne and Yates. (b) November 1, 1984--The Counties of

Herkimer, Jefferson, Lewis, Madison, Oneida, Onondaga and Oswego, and the

Villages of Earlville in Chenango County and Dolgeville in Fulton

County. (c) March 1, 1985--The

Counties of Broome, Chenango, Cortland, Delaware, Otsego, Tioga and

Tompkins. (d) June 1, 1985--The

Counties of Allegany, Cattaraugus, Chautauqua, Erie (except the City of

Buffalo), Genesee, Niagara, Orleans and Wyoming. (e) October 1, 1985--The Counties of Albany, Clinton, Essex, Franklin, Fulton, Hamilton, Montgomery, Rensselaer, St. Lawrence, Saratoga, Schenectady, Schoharie, Warren and Washington. (f) February 1, 1986--The Counties of

Columbia, Dutchess, Greene, Orange, Putnam, Rockland, Sullivan, Ulster and

Westchester. (g) June 1, 1986--The

Counties of Nassau and Suffolk (except those parts of Suffolk for which a
district court has been established). (h) July 1, 1988--The Cities of Buffalo and

Rochester. (i) August 1, 2000--The
portion of Suffolk County for which a district court has been
established. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
91.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
